item.title: Virtua Fighter Direct 2025 Spring set for May 11
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/virtua-fighter-direct-2025-spring-set-for-may-11

New developments in the Virtua Fighter series to be revealed.

SEGA will premiere “Virtua Fighter Direct 2025 Spring” on May 11 at 7:00 a.m. PT / 10:00 a.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Korean.

The broadcast will reveal new developments in the Virtua Fighter series.

Stay tuned.

item.title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot DLC ‘DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm – Part 1’ launches July 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/dragon-ball-z-kakarot-dlc-daima-adventure-through-the-demon-realm-part-1-launches-july-17

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Second part to follow in early 2026.

Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot downloadable content “DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm – Part 1″ will launch on July 17, publisher Bandai Namco and developer CyberConnect2 announced. “Part 2” will follow between January and March 2026.

Here is an overview of the content, via Bandai Namco:

Explore the World of Dragon Ball DAIMA

“DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Pack” invites you to relive the thrilling adventures of Goku (Mini) and his friends Glorio, Shin and Panzy. Traverse fields and maps that faithfully recreate the stunning world of the anime series, Dragon Ball DAIMA.

Immerse Yourself in the Demon Realm

Experience the world of Dragon Ball DAIMA through the eyes of Goku (Mini). Walk through the intricate landscapes of the Demon World, meet new friends, fight new enemies, and discover new mysteries.

Engage in Battles with New Techniques

Experience battles as they are depicted in the anime, utilizing new techniques with the Power Pole. Leverage the Medi-Bug to get various effects and get support from Panzi and others to add a strategic layer to your combat.

These new elements bring a fresh and exciting dimension to Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot.

Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

“DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm – Part 1” Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact demo for PS5, PC launches in May
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/hunter-x-hunter-nen-x-impact-demo-for-ps5-pc-launches-in-may

  • PC
  • PS5

Includes six playable characters.

Publisher Bushiroad Games and developer Eighting will release a demo for fighting game Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam in May, the companies announced.

The demo will feature playable characters Gon, Killua, Leorio, Kurapika, Hisoka, and Netero, as well as access to both Battle and Training modes.

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 17.
